original_text:
In the brush they gathered salt herbs,
    and their food was the root of the broom bush.
korean_text: 떨기나무 가운데에서 짠 나물을 꺾으며 대싸리 뿌리로 먹을 거리를 삼느니라

sentences.original_text: In the brush they gathered salt herbs
sentences.korean_translation: 덤불 속에서 그들은 소금 허브를 모았다

sentences.original_text: and their food was the root of the broom bush
